SELECT sales.id as id, sales.after_sales_no, sales.order_no, sales.order_detail_no, sales.created_at, sales.reason, sales.remark, sales.photos, sales.quantity as skuQuantity, sales.price as skuPrice, sales.money, sales.send_at, sales.receive_at, sales.status, sales.sub_status, sales.close_at, sales.apply_at, sales.audit_first_at, sales.audit_second_at, sales.created_time, sales.shop_no, concat(u.`name`,' ',u.phone) as userName,
mo.order_no as moOrderNo, mo.status as moStatus, mo.total_money, mo.real_money, mo.deliver_method, mo.pay_type, mo.all_money, mo.all_money-mo.real_money as shipping_money,
modetail.order_no as detailOrderNo, modetail.order_detail_no as orderDetailNo, modetail.item_no, modetail.item_name, modetail.item_cover, modetail.goods_no, modetail.sku_no, modetail.quantity as detailQuantity, modetail.price as detailPrice FROM mall_after_sales sales left join mall_order mo on sales.order_no=mo.order_no LEFT JOIN mall_order_detail modetail ON IF(mo.order_type=2, sales.order_detail_no=modetail.order_detail_no , modetail.order_no = mo.order_no ) LEFT JOIN user u ON sales.user_id=u.id WHERE sales.shop_no in
#{shopNo}
and modetail.refund_no like concat('%',#{p.refundNo},'%')
and sales.after_sales_no like concat('%',#{p.afterSalesNo},'%')
and sales.status=#{p.status}
and sales.sub_status=1010
and sales.sub_status=1030
and (sales.sub_status=1050 or sales.sub_status=2010)
and (sales.sub_status=1080 or sales.sub_status=2020 or sales.sub_status=2030)
and (sales.sub_status=1020 or sales.sub_status=1040 or sales.sub_status=1060 or sales.sub_status=2050)
and sales.sub_status=1090
and unix_timestamp(sales.created_time) >= #{p.applyAtFrom}
and unix_timestamp(sales.created_time) <= #{p.applyAtTo}
and sales.order_no like concat('%',#{p.orderNo},'%')
and (modetail.item_name LIKE concat('%',#{p.shopItem},'%') OR modetail.goods_no LIKE concat('%',#{p.shopItem},'%'))
and (u.`name` LIKE concat('%',#{p.userName},'%') OR u.phone LIKE concat('%',#{p.userName},'%'))
order by sales.created_time DESC
